name: Malicious Bane
summary: Whether your heart is pure or corrupt, you can call forth a malediction upon your foes.
description:
Whether your heart is pure or corrupt, you can call forth a malediction upon your foes. You can cast bane once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
